dcterms:description: CASIA-B consists of 124 subjects under three distinct walking conditions. 11 sequences of each subject on every walking condition are captured from different viewpoints.
dcterms:title: CASIA-B

dcterms:description: OUMVLP-Pose is built on the large-scale OUMVLP dataset, which comprises 10,307 subjects from 14 viewpoints. It provides 18-keypoint pose data extracted by AlphaPose and OpenPose.
dcterms:title: OUMVLP-Pose

dcterms:description: GREW is a large-scale dataset including 26,345 individuals captured by 882 cameras in real-world settings. It provides pose information comprising 17 keypoints.
dcterms:title: GREW

dcterms:description: Gait3D is an in-the-wild dataset collected by 39 cameras from a fixed real-world environment, consisting of 4,000 subjects. It includes pose information of 17 keypoints.
dcterms:title: Gait3D
